docs.snippet: The Uruguayan Minister, Jose Richling, said today he would be in New York on Nov. 3 to sign a readjustment agreement on Republic of Uruguay bonds with the Foreign Bondholders Protective Council of New York.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Uruguayan Minister, Jose Richling, said today he would be in New York on Nov. 3 to sign a readjustment agreement on Republic of Uruguay bonds with the Foreign Bondholders Protective Council of New York.

docs.snippet: Mark Twain's "The Adventures of Tom Sawyer" was ordered removed today" from the public libraries and schools in Rio de Janeiro State as part of Brazil's campaign against "subversive" and "Communist" literature.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mark Twain's "The Adventures of Tom Sawyer" was ordered removed today" from the public libraries and schools in Rio de Janeiro State as part of Brazil's campaign against "subversive" and "Communist" literature.

docs.snippet: Pronounced weakness in secondary railroad issues was the feature of an otherwise firm undertone in bond trading yesterday on the New York Stock Exchange. The decline in the rail loans, however, which, incidentally, was attributed in trading circles...
docs.lead_paragraph: Pronounced weakness in secondary railroad issues was the feature of an otherwise firm undertone in bond trading yesterday on the New York Stock Exchange. The decline in the rail loans, however, which, incidentally, was attributed in trading circles largely to profit-taking,

docs.snippet: Members of the Flying Caravan of five women who will make a 17,000-mile tour of South America by air for the People's Mandate to End War and urge ratification of the treaties signed at the Inter-American Peace Conference at Buenos Aires received a...
docs.lead_paragraph: Members of the Flying Caravan of five women who will make a 17,000-mile tour of South America by air for the People's Mandate to End War and urge ratification of the treaties signed at the Inter-American Peace Conference at Buenos Aires received a hearty send-off today from Sumner Welles as Acting Secretary of State.
docs.abstract: Receives women planning peace tour of South Amer

docs.snippet: The government last night issued a decree prohibiting the exportation of wheat and flour until further notice. At the same time Brig. Gen. Basilio B. Pertine, Minister of War, ordered all the army's baking equipment concentrated in this city and...
docs.lead_paragraph: The government last night issued a decree prohibiting the exportation of wheat and flour until further notice. At the same time Brig. Gen. Basilio B. Pertine, Minister of War, ordered all the army's baking equipment concentrated in this city and instructions were issued to the national penitentiary to be prepared to work its bakery at full capacity to supply bread to the public.
docs.abstract: Govt invokes embargo in bread price cut drive

headline.main: ARGENTINA INVOKES WHEAT EMBARGO; Exportation Is Prohibited to Insure Supply for Nation--Flour on List Also
